metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6305 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.1. This is related to a patch described as "8 of 9. Out of Bounds read and write."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6305` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.9.1-1
ytnef-tools - 1.9.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libytnef package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.1-1').
